link.description:
Click "Submit", then touch the right arrow on the router to register Freebox Home with Home Assistant.

![Location of button on the router](/static/images/config_freebox.png)
link.title: Link Freebox router

You can check this link to obtain the values: http://mafreebox.freebox.fr/api_version
